challenges: finding out what they really feel
defining themselves and their worth in relation to others' opinions and expectations
balancing their high vision and ideals with the practical realities of this world

guidelines: Recognize that you have a refined quality; live it.
Find the beauty that flows from service to others.
Face self-doubt like a warrior; accept its challenge.
Accept what you feel, and who you are now, as perfect.
questions: Do I allow self-doubt or perfectionism to discourage me?
What is perfect about my situation right now?
Do I have trouble knowing what I really want or feel?
Do I base my decisions on higher principles and integrity?
If these questions generate any insights, how might you put these insights into practice?

advice: Engage in a daily exercise routine, such as brisk walks, strength exercises, or more sophisticated training.
Practice patience and experiment with different exercises to find what works best.
Start modestly with exercise and gradually increase intensity.
Prioritize a fresh, varied diet and pay attention to how different foods affect their well-being.
Avoid making idealistic resolutions or schemes they don't carry out or buying equipment they've never used before
negative: Chronic depression can compromise their immune system, leading to colds, stress headaches, or other depressive symptoms.
High-strung nature can lead to issues with the nervous system, sexual area, and abdomen.
Prone to sore throats or chronic jaw tension if they withhold their feelings.
Digestive symptoms, skin eruptions, or other adverse reactions to food not well-suited to their constitution.
positive: Refined energy field gives them an attractive appearance.
Tend to "take good pictures" due to their energy fields.

opportunities: Serving as an example to others
Living an ordinary life based on higher laws

advice: Stay in touch with their feelings to improve communication and reduce anxiety.
Work on expressing themselves honestly and authentically.
Let go of judgment and embrace acceptance in relationships.
Address issues of self-doubt, perfectionism, and morality in their sexual relationships.
negative: Nervous hyperactivity and anxiety to please others can make them uncomfortable to be around.
Rapid speech and constant flow of thoughts can overwhelm others.
High standards can pose a burden on loved ones.
Difficulty expressing themselves honestly can create challenges in relationships.
positive: Open up to relaxed and accepting relationships once they overcome self-judgment.
Experience more loving, intimate, and pleasurable sex lives as they work on their life path.

advice: Pursue fields that utilize their charisma, high standards, and expressive energy, such as acting, teaching, bodywork, writing, psychotherapy, or business.
Embrace their intuitive spiritual wisdom and share their insights with the world.
Focus on making a good living rather than striving for excessive wealth.
negative: May avoid spiritual or metaphysical ideas due to subconscious fears or self-doubt.
Can struggle with wanting more than they have financially, driven by their ideals.
positive: Often live a conventional life with hidden depths of wisdom.
Bring fresh insights, perspectives, and information into the world.
Have the ability to understand and teach anything effectively.
Can achieve financial stability through their innate wisdom.
